## Request for Proposal - Online Courses for FCC Knowledge Offering

**Reference**: 2023-DW-005
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
**Publication Date**: May 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: June 1, 2023, 2:00 PM CST

### Overview

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a supplier to develop online courses for its Knowledge Offering program. The goal is to improve the business management skills of Canadian farmers, focusing on topics such as financial management, strategy and planning, managing people, and more.

### Key Requirements

* Develop a video content course for the online platform
* Create a mix of video lectures and self-directed learning activities
* Targeted at younger farmers (under 40 years old)
* Course to be launched in 2024

### Evaluation Criteria

* Supplier's ability to deliver high-quality video content
* Effectiveness of the online course in improving business management skills
* Ability to meet the project timeline and budget
* Proposed approach to project partnership and collaboration

### Tender Description

FCC aims to improve the business management skills of Canadian farmers through its Knowledge Offering program. The program provides content and knowledge through various channels, including articles, podcasts, events, videos, publications, and webinars. The online course will be part of this program, focusing on providing an opportunity for young farmers to dive deeper into specific topics.

### Notification Specifications

* Tender documents and attachments available on MERX (https://www.merx.com)
* Electronic submission via MERX required
* Proposals must be submitted in PDF or MS Word format)

### Additional Information

* The procurement process is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* FCC is an official languages institution, and bidders may respond in English or French.
* The RFP is a non-binding, competitive process. FCC may cancel the RFP at any time, and is not obligated to proceed with the project.

Contact Information:

* David Wark, Procurement and Vendor Manager, Farm Credit Canada, [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca), (555) 555-5555

You can submit your proposal and access tender documents on the MERX website (http://www.merx.com). Note that fees may apply. For more information on the MERX pricing, please visit https://www.merx.com/public/pricing.
